name: Hotel Francia e Quirinale

reviews.title: Good standard of hotel in a lovely town
reviews.text: The Hotel Francia et Quiranale is a beautifully kept, large but peaceful hotel. Our room had a balcony overlooking the pool which was completely empty, apart from ourselves, for most of our stay. The hotel is well air conditioned and the staff speak good English and are very helpful. We paid a fraction of the price we would have paid for a hotel of similar quality in Britain. Montecatini itself is a lovely, interesting spa town. We stayed for four nights at the beginning of July 2005 and could have stayed for longer. The train to Florence takes about forty five minutes but we would recommend staying in Montecatini and in particular the Francia and Quiranale.

reviews.title: Quiet in a relaxing town
reviews.text: Pretty room, clean and quiet. Food was good and staff was nice.

reviews.title: Very nice hotel in a nice town
reviews.text: This hotel is very nice for Italian standards and has excellent public rooms. The bedrooms are average for Italy (on the small size.) The food in the hotel restaurant is quite acceptable. It's got a nice location a couple of blocks off the main shopping street. The town is lovely with many flowers everywhere.

description: Francia & Quirinale Hotel sits in a prestigious yet quiet area of downtown Montecatini Terme, within walking distance from the town’s thermal springs and its beautiful park. The Giusfredi family has owned and managed the hotel since the 1920s, constantly renewing what they consider their Home with the greatest devotion and passion.
